Reviews.Title: “Location and customer service superb”

Reviews.Content: stayed moderno twice january 2012 stay hesitation ideally situated 20m centre la ramblas liceu metro station access hotel easy staff exceptionally helpful friendly courteous stay experienced travels clean quiet roomy stay breakfast provided

Reviews.Content: location hotel excellent middle las ramblas five minute walk time negotiate metro quicker walk staff lovely couldnt reasonable size comfy beds tea coffee facilities bathroom hairdryer travel kit toiletries provided breakfast excellent range hot cold meats eggs wide selection bread plentiful fresh fruit coffee freshly ground cold fruit juices hesitate recommend hotel visiting barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, great location and homely rooms!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights incredibly impressed hotel arrival english speaking staff incredibly helpful accommodating homely clean respectable size location fabulous las rambla main metro stop couldnt hear noise breakfast fab variety foods sausage thoroughly recommend
